statement.p: Given the equilibrium expression \displaystyle{K}=\frac{{{\left[{C}{O}_{{2}}\right]}{\left[{H}_{{2}}\right]}}}{{{\left[{C}{O}\right]}{\left[{H}_{{2}}{O}\right]}}} , where \displaystyle{K}={7.60} and the equilibrium concentrations below, calculate the amount changed \displaystyle{x}.
This is a chemistry question, round using significant digits.
Hint: Start by plugging in all values and variables into the equilibrium expression.
